description: The STRING protein identifier for the specific protein.
The Cluster of Orthologous Groups (COG) identifier.
The numerical ID representing the last common ancestor (LCA) or root clade.
The descriptive name of the root clade.
The common gene name (e.g., HGNC symbol) used for querying. This is the PRIMARY KEY.
The NCBI Taxonomy ID for the species of the protein.
